item.title: Time Series
item.description:
I wholeheartedly believe the best way to guide the learning experience of this subject is a four steps process:\n

1. Grasping the historical context in which the idea was born and the state of the art at said point in time, to fully understand the driving forces behind them and the way they where received

2. Live statistical programming replications of historical papers, to empirically validate their relevance regardless of their recognition in mainstream circles

3. Applying the use of the idea on many different cases (datasets) to understand their value today

4. Finally, teaching the subject to others in order to consolidate the learning experience and avoid blindspots

I’m currently working on sharing the course material as am online asynchronous course
